title: Do you have any idea how hard it is to drop a pink ward after Zed ulting a Vayne?
body:
Like really do you guys play this game?

New Lense trinket is atrocious, not to mention late game pinks are not an option (item slot efficency anyone?)

What a joke.

replies.body: I personally love the new sweeping trinket.

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=K4HKfEEJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-29T20:53:41.172+0000)
>
> I personally love the new sweeping trinket.

It's amazing except for the fact that it's almost useless against stealth champs. Sure, after a delay you can see where they are but if you're someone that needs to target them then you're screwed. For clearing wards its wonderful but otherwise yeah nah.

I've always pre-trinketed before doing an all-in on a vayne/talon so I didn't even notice there was a change/delay?

The reveal-stealth component follows you after activated and as zed, even half the duration is enough to do all your buttons. No real reason to be scanning AFTER you ult.

Only time would be if you were caught out and had to defensively ult but then you should be punished for that.

> [{quoted}](name=Tomblade,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=K4HKfEEJ,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-29T22:34:08.341+0000)
>
> I've always pre-trinketed before doing an all-in on a vayne/talon so I didn't even notice there was a change/delay?
> 
> The reveal-stealth component follows you after activated and as zed, even half the duration is enough to do all your buttons. No real reason to be scanning AFTER you ult.
> 
> Only time would be if you were caught out and had to defensively ult but then you should be punished for that.

Quote from patch notes:

"Sweeping Lens
NEWSIGHT BEYOND SIGHT In addition to disabling wards, Sweeping Lens will spawn warning particles over units it finds that you can't see (champions, pink wards, etc.)
RANGE 500 - 2000 (at levels 1-18)
COOLDOWN 90 - 60 seconds (at levels 1-18)
SIZE 450 - 575 (at levels 1-18)
Oracle Alteration
ALTERED LENS At level 9, you can alter your Sweeping Lens into an Oracle's Lens. Once altered, Oracle's Lens instead constantly sweeps the area around your champion for 10 seconds.
REMOVEDFALSE SIGHT? No longer grants true sight
NEWSIGHT BEYOND SIGHT In addition to disabling wards, Sweeping Lens will spawn warning particles over units it finds that you can't see (champions, pink wards, etc.)
SIZE Increased by about 50%"

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
It doesnt give true sight (pretty sure) so you cant reveal stealthed Champions since 5.22 without pinks.

I used to pre-pop it as Zed vs Vayne :p
the sweepers lens doesn't reveal champions it gives them a short minor vision like Rengar ult but not as good.
